[Coherence - the collective quality of all sentences. We align this dimension with the DUC quality question (Dang, 2005) of structure and coherence whereby "the summary should be well-structured and well-organized. To clarify, if you were a language teacher, how would you grade the flow of ideas? Does the summary contain connectors to connect ideas?
